Text: Man your instructions suck ass, people listen here just after you install Wordfast copy paste org.gs4tr.editor.security_2.1.4.2  into plugins folder which is located in program installation folder and erase from there this org.gs4tr.editor.security_2.1.8. And that's it, instructions located in this torrent are one of the worst instructions I have ever seen, for Ripley's believe it or not

this works fine, I did as FAAIP said :)

don't forget when you open your files to translate, to convert them into word 2003, because the latest versions of word are unsupported.
